articles.content: In todays analysis of UKOIL, the price slightly declined to $82.61, a 0.04% decrease. The pivot point at $82.07 is crucial for the days sentiment. Resistance levels are noted at $84.00, $85.78, and $… [+501 chars]

articles.content: What a difference a year makes.  In 2022, Jane Fraser of Citigroup was earning almost as much as David Solomon of Goldman Sachs ($24.5m plays $25m).  Now that the official numbers have become availab… [+6031 chars]
